name: Coloring Kids
description:
*** Your Kids loves painting, coloring and sketching ? This app for you! ****

- Coloring Kids is designed only for your 2-7 years old son but your daughter as well. Color the coloring pages of christmas on your phone or tablet in this virtual coloring and painting book. It so easy that even toddler can play.

- This coloring game is a kids game where children can color cartoon characters like gumball, spongbob, and for girls we have many princesses pages and your daughter can coloring and make them like famous princesses cindrella or aurora the christmas and winter coloring pages, but they can also draw their own drawing . Both, boys and girls will love this coloring book game for kids. In this coloring game you can find reindeer, magic cookies, candies, santa claus and a lot of christmas decoration.

- With the amazing coloring pages and beautiful brushes, your little one is guaranteed hours of fun to free their endless imagination.The toolbar has brush,crayon,doodle paint,will show you how to coloring step by step, many beautiful animal, Vehicule, characters, mermaids ,princesses coloring pictures. ALL ARE FREE!
If you or your kid likes fairy tales story you will probably also enjoy coloring and painting the models in this app.

- Features:
- various brushes, including dry brush, water-color, crayon, pen, rainbow, glow neon.
- easy color picker
- show or hide menu by tapping the right-bottom button
- undo/redo
- Amazing tools
- Easy-to-use navigation
- Interactive effects children just love
- Custom background for your kids to free drawing
- Run on both phone and tablet
- Suitable for both smart phones and tablets.
- Provides flawless coloring experience for every single detail.
- We develop educational games designed for toddlers, preschoolers and kids.
- About many colorings: cats, dogs, fish, birds, animals, marine animals, horses, rabbits, cars, castles, dinosaurs, flowers, princesses, fairies, fruits, vegetables, Valentine's Day, Easter, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Saint Patrick, Christmas, New Year's Eve.

- We hope you and your children have enjoyed this online painting game. In this case, we will appreciate if you rate us a five in this kids game so we can improve and bring more new updates. Positive votes and comments make us improve this game and app for kids.

- Enjoy!
For any comments or suggestions, please send an e-mail. Thanks!.
